sentences: Tema kohutavalt suurep채rane suhtlemine meelitas kogu t채iskasvanute r체tme.
context: The word 'kohutavalt' in Estonian is an adverb meaning terribly or awfully. It can be used to emphasize the intensity of a negative situation or feeling, but it might also carry connotations depending on context; for instance, it could imply something as being very good ('terribly good').
